title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that Europe has risen faster than sub-Sahara Africa.

Two points for comparing how the trends are different by referencing changes in the data over time.
descriptions: The response does not correctly compare the data trend from 1960 to 2015 for sub-Saharan Africa to the trend shown for Europe using one of the following:

title: Part B

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that grain yields have no effect on population in stage 4 countries.

Two points for explaining how grain yields have no effect on populations in stage 4 of the demographic transition or outmigration.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point for stating that food insecurity is lack of access to food or finances.

Two points for explaining how the data shown on the graph is limited in describing food insecurity.
